queryMap.query: /* rsm4012_s01 */ SELECT '운영본부' AS GUBUN, --MEET_CD NVL(SUM(GITA1),0) GITA1, NVL(SUM(GITA2),0) GITA2 FROM TBJI_PC_GITA WHERE 1=1 AND MEET_CD = ? AND JIGEUP_DT = ? --GROUP BY MEET_CD

/* rsm4012_s02 */ SELECT '창원' AS GUBUN, --DECODE(CYCLECD, '001', '001', '002', '002', '003', '004', '099', '003', '999') MEET_CD, NVL(SUM(GITA),0) GITA1, NVL(SUM(JUMIN),0) GITA2 FROM CCRC.VIEW_TAX@CCRCLINK WHERE 1=1 AND CYCLECD = ? AND PAYDATE = ? --GROUP BY CYCLECD

/* rsm4012_s03 */ SELECT '부산' AS GUBUN, --DECODE(CYCLECD, '001', '001', '002', '002', '003', '004', '099', '003', '999') MEET_CD, NVL(SUM(GITA),0) GITA1, NVL(SUM(JUMIN),0) GITA2 FROM BCRC.VW_BUS_TAX@BCRCDBLINK WHERE 1=1 AND CYCLECD = ? AND PAYDATE = ? --GROUP BY CYCLECD
/* rsm4012_s04 */ SELECT '운영본부' AS GUBUN, --MEET_CD NVL(SUM(GITA1),0) GITA1, NVL(SUM(GITA2),0) GITA2 FROM TBJI_PC_GITA WHERE 1=1 AND MEET_CD = ? AND JIGEUP_DT = ? --GROUP BY MEET_CD

/* rsm4012_s05 */ SELECT '창원' AS GUBUN, --DECODE(CYCLECD, '001', '001', '002', '002', '003', '004', '099', '003', '999') MEET_CD, NVL(SUM(GITA),0) GITA1, NVL(SUM(JUMIN),0) GITA2 FROM CCRC.VIEW_TAX@CCRCLINK WHERE 1=1 AND CYCLECD = ? AND PAYDATE = ? --GROUP BY CYCLECD

/* rsm4012_s06 */ SELECT '부산' AS GUBUN, --DECODE(CYCLECD, '001', '001', '002', '002', '003', '004', '099', '003', '999') MEET_CD, NVL(SUM(GITA),0) GITA1, NVL(SUM(JUMIN),0) GITA2 FROM BCRC.VW_BUS_TAX@BCRCDBLINK WHERE 1=1 AND CYCLECD = ? AND PAYDATE = ? --GROUP BY CYCLECD
